{"step_by_step_thinking": "The question is asking for the best marker for neural tube defect. From the given documents, we can see that Alpha-fetoprotein measurement in amniotic fluid is used to diagnose neural tube defects, including anencephaly and spina bifida, before 20th week of gestation. This method is used along with ultrasonics and possibly following interruption. Therefore, Alpha fetoprotein (C) is the best marker for neural tube defect.", "answer_choice": "C"}
